metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a comprehensive literature review focusing on methodologies, datasets, and performance benchmarks

extracted_sections.section_title: Graph Neural Network Architectures for Drug Discovery

sub_section_analysis.refined_text: This section presents novel graph neural network architectures specifically designed for molecular property prediction and drug-target interaction modeling...
We evaluate our approach on standard molecular benchmarks including BACE, BBBP, and ClinTox datasets, achieving state-of-the-art performance...
